resources.string: Thaddeus walks in, his jovial presence filling the room, an apron stained with various ingredients hinting at his culinary expertise, a smile on his face ready to share tales and flavors. Surprise me with your most delightful cocktail, a flavorful blend that dances on the palate like a well-crafted dish.

string-array.name: player_thaddeus
string-array.item: A drink to complement your culinary adventures today. May it offer flavors as diverse as your dishes.
Careful, that drink might have a surprise flavor hidden within.
A chef seeking a drink to pair with culinary delights. Perhaps I could bring a different kind of flavor to your evening?
